original_text: Another time Jesus went into the synagogue, and a man with a shriveled hand was there.
korean_text: 예수께서 다시 회당에 들어가시니 한쪽 손 마른 사람이 거기 있는지라

sentences.original_text: Another time Jesus went into the synagogue
sentences.korean_translation: 또 다른 때에 예수님이 회당에 들어가셨다

sentences.original_text: and a man with a shriveled hand was there
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 오그라든 손을 가진 한 사람이 거기에 있었다
